scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc -p tsconfig.json && cp -r "package.json" "static" "dist/" && npm run html
scripts.test: TS_NODE_PROJECT=test/tsconfig.json NODE_ENV=test nyc mocha --sort --trace-warnings --require ts-node/register --check-leaks --recursive --timeout 60000 --exit test/**/*test.ts && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov > coverage.lcov
scripts.test:win: set TS_NODE_PROJECT=test/tsconfig.json&&set NODE_ENV=test&& nyc mocha --sort --trace-warnings --require ts-node/register --check-leaks --recursive --timeout 60000 --exit test/**/*test.ts&& nyc report --reporter=text-lcov > coverage.lcov
scripts.coverage: TS_NODE_PROJECT=test/tsconfig.json NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter=html mocha --sort --require ts-node/register --check-leaks --recursive --timeout 60000 --exit test/**/*test.ts && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov > coverage.lcov
scripts.coverage:win: set TS_NODE_PROJECT=test/tsconfig.json&&set NODE_ENV=test&& nyc --reporter=html mocha --sort --require ts-node/register --check-leaks --recursive --timeout 60000 --exit test/**/*test.ts &&nyc report --reporter=text-lcov > coverage.lcov
